website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for novices and those who don't want to spend a lot. Owners are impressed with the reception and price.
pros: A basic model w/impressive noise-filtering abilities
Build feels surprisingly solid considering the low price
cons: Lacks the bells and whistles of other choices
Some issues with the mic have been reported

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this Midland to anyone who wants a great radio
customer_reviews.text: I'm a truck driver and this Midland is perfect for my pick up truck and a back up for my semi if my other one goes out. It gets out pretty far . And is really clear
customer_reviews.author: danny lee davis

customer_reviews.title: great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: What a great cb radio for the price. I get about 5 miles on it (I would get more but I live in a vary rapidly changing landscape. Lots of hills.) But it works well for me n my friends to communicate around town. It is an excellent starter kit for anyone looking into a cb radio. it is however prone to burning out, had it less then 4 months and it just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: LYNETTE LOPES

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. PA out could definitely be louder
customer_reviews.text: Everything works. Great quality. PA out could definitely be louder. Its not as loud as my Cobra. But if you want a smaller CB that looks great and functions very well, just buy it now.
customer_reviews.author: VaderIncarnate

customer_reviews.title: Great radio,
customer_reviews.text: Used on a trip to Denver, worked perfectly. In fact worked better than cell phone in Oklahoma.
customer_reviews.author: sue hadden

customer_reviews.title: Warranty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these items One has stopped working according to the information on the box there’s a 3-year warranty I would like to return it or get a replacement
customer_reviews.author: LewannaDrakeford

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great. One thing I’m happy about the mic quality. Really feels like you’re holding a nice piece
customer_reviews.author: jenni

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, haven’t had a ton of time to use it yet but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Sletterink

customer_reviews.title: Good radio
customer_reviews.text: My fiance loves his new CB. It does what described. He said he will take it to get peaked and tuned so he can get an extra 10 miles or so out of it. Otherwise, it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: HonestReviewsOnly

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and exactly as described. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason/Mike

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before buying this product,
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for my truck, right out of the package you can hear others but will not transmit. Seems to be poor quality have purchased other brands that worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: We installed it in our motorhome so we haven't had the opportunity to use it much. Bought it at the end of camping season. When we did use it, on a thousand-mile trip, it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Eleganza Baton Rouge, LA

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, quality product
customer_reviews.text: this is a quality radio and works very well. I gave it 4 stars because sometimes it will skip a channel if you turn the dial too slow.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Allen

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Radio worked well for a few months and then it had transmission and receiving issues. CB shop basically told me it was now junk.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald M.

customer_reviews.title: Great CB for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great radio for the price. exactly what I was looking for. I received it faster then I expected as well. Very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job running local fuel tanker in the city. No complaints. Basic unit.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: CB Radio
customer_reviews.text: Radio seems okay, the mic broke and we were unable to "purchase" spares from Midland. We could return the mic for a new one, but must go thru the "return" process which is time consuming and leaves us with out use of the radio for the duration of that return and receive process.
customer_reviews.author: PHIL WEISS

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, just ordered my 2nd
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these for my truck a while back, and just ordered a second for my car. They're great to have, fun to use, and more helpful than you'd think. The use of this unit is very easy, only thing I was it could do was scan, but I knew that when I got it so no star loss for that. Reasonably cheap, good unit. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: good item
customer_reviews.text: excellent product, very worth the money, cant wait to use this while snowplowing this winter. Wouldn't be without a CB here.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Berry

customer_reviews.title: They're pretty simple machines
customer_reviews.text: It's a CB. They're pretty simple machines. And this one worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: dont last........
customer_reviews.text: only worked about 9 months got it for xmas last year. just quit receiving & transmitting
customer_reviews.author: edward e.

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this cb about a month now and so far its great. Right now its hooked up to a 4 foot radio shack antenna and the signal and clarity is awesome. Haven't really used the noise filter much. Shipping was quick, actually came several days earlier than expected. Overall it seems like a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Q.

customer_reviews.title: Midland CB
customer_reviews.text: Had to return first one sent. Replacement works well as expected
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: great CB
customer_reviews.text: its a great cb radio for my truck just the right size and right price.perfect for what i needed .thanks
customer_reviews.author: allen newell

customer_reviews.title: unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work. Was bench tested. Speaker module didnt work. CB would not change channels. Would not recommend. Waiting on refund.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton Moore

customer_reviews.title: horrible audio, seems to be a cheap
customer_reviews.text: Does not transmit far or at all, horrible audio, seems to be a cheap product
customer_reviews.author: Lou Giovannetti

customer_reviews.title: It's nice to have a CB midland 5001z it works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to have a CB midland 5001z it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my Husband & he is very pleased with the quality & range of the CB.......Works great
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: Works great, just have a modulation problem
customer_reviews.text: Works great,just have a modulation problem,might need to ground the antenna.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hay

customer_reviews.title: Works great. good value for what im looking for
customer_reviews.text: Works great .good value for what im looking for .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: IT comes With an electrical problem! I didn't last 5 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Andres Baez

customer_reviews.title: midland 5001z
customer_reviews.text: This radio does perform as expected. Great product for the price.Would recommend it for anyone needing this type of radio for casual communications.
customer_reviews.author: daniel a. silvestro

customer_reviews.title: Midland 5001Z
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived quicker than expected - that's good. All hardware needed to install was in the package and installation was easy. At this time, other than turning it on and verifying the mike keyed the transmit function, I've not had a chance to check out sound quality or reception.
customer_reviews.author: InyoJohn

customer_reviews.title: would not work
customer_reviews.text: I have had this model before and was satisfied but I could not adjust the SWR on this one. I tried 3 different antennas and none would work.
customer_reviews.author: DONALD D.

customer_reviews.title: cheap stuff
customer_reviews.text: Bought this CB a few months back and after hooking it up it worked great.. able to get a few mile range out of it in the city and 5 or so on the open road.. However its now been 3 months and it no longer transmits or receives. Going to contact midland for repairs
customer_reviews.author: revitupmoto33

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect! Fits well in my truck. I can easily hear other people. The mic has a great weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: this is the best
customer_reviews.text: this is awsome suggest people to buy it to use it i loved it cuz its the best cb on earth
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, no problems. Easy installation. Range of at least 20 miles in my experience during the 1st week. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: gasoline rainbow

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Radio seemed good but the size on the website was inaccurate. Amazon took it back no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hubler

customer_reviews.title: stopped working within a year
customer_reviews.text: I only had this CB less then a year and it went south. I wouldnt buy another one like it.
customer_reviews.author: order guy

customer_reviews.title: Received it and went to put it in just to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought one put it in didn't work. Returned it. They sent me a new one. Didn't work. Junk buy any thing else. Or grab a string and 2 cans they'd work better.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN Z.

customer_reviews.title: A Good Inexpensive Communication Option.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good radio at a good price. I bought this because in an emergency situation, you need to have several communication options and CB is one viable communication option. The only reason why I did not give it a 5 is because CB band (11M band) in general is range limited and prone to unregulated use by folks who do not necessarily respect public airways. 10-4.
customer_reviews.author: Kegz

customer_reviews.title: cb radio
customer_reviews.text: my husband is a trucker this radio has been a life saver and a very usefull item to have. he would recommend this to any trucker great value fast shipping excellent
customer_reviews.author: s.cavilier

customer_reviews.title: Midland vs Cobra
customer_reviews.text: Always owned Cobra's in the past and always had issues..So I went with a Midland this time and I am very impressed and do not have the issue I have been having with the Cobra's.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Midland CB Radio
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Radio for a backup communication system in case of SHTF. It is powered by a sealed battery and charged by Solar Power! Great choice!!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Dillingham

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I've used this CB probably a total of twice and now all of a sudden it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Haywood

customer_reviews.title: its just ok
customer_reviews.text: the cb was ok but the pa fully turned up barely worked so if ur looking for just a cb ok but not if ur looking for a pa system
customer_reviews.author: matt shorter-bridges

customer_reviews.title: good radio for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a CB and didn't want to spend $100. So I got this one it has a chrome front and a good heavy mike. It works great in my truck. Can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jason-B

customer_reviews.title: Basic CB
customer_reviews.text: I never meet a trucker yet that was not a CB expert and no body had a radio as good as his. These little units are simple and to the point. They put out all the legal power they can and who REALLY uses or understands what all the knobs do on the much more expensive units? So if you wants bragging rights based on looks this unit is not for you. If you use your CB to help make a living and required a good solid unit at a fair price this unit is what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Carson

customer_reviews.title: ... he likes the radio and it has been working fine since he installed it
customer_reviews.text: My Husband is a truck driver he says he likes the radio and it has been working fine since he installed it.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Anne

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my husband
customer_reviews.text: Great item for my husband who out of the blue decided he wanted a cb radio. Installation was easy. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Gresser

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality. I would recommend an optional speaker extension ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. I would recommend an optional speaker extension which this unit has a special rear jack in-put to accommodate just that.
customer_reviews.author: -KL

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: just installed it and checked standing wave. I have not really used it yet but seams to work and sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley E Clark

customer_reviews.title: great little radio I have it on my side by ...
customer_reviews.text: great little radio I have it on my side by side Arctic Cat for hunting works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: This Midland CB radio is not very fancy but I installed it in 5 minutes and used it during my drive today. It worked exactly as it should. The sound was clear and I was able to be heard . That's all I need
customer_reviews.author: Brett Kear

customer_reviews.title: Midland CB
customer_reviews.text: When My old CB went out I decided to try the midland. Nice clean look and works great when on the trails so I give it a full 5 star thumbs up and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary E. Hays

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: My only real comment is that it's HUGE. I didn't realize how large, which makes it difficult to mount. Otherwise I'm pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: BigRed

customer_reviews.title: Does all things well!
customer_reviews.text: Good noise supression, clear transmission signal, easy to install, good audio and pretty fair speaker: Strongly recommend for every one
customer_reviews.author: Roscoetex

customer_reviews.title: midland 5001z
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. shipped two days earlier than expected. didnt need the mount but mount was good. 40 channels are good. mike works good. and looks great. its pretty big so dont expect to mount it in your dash like a radio.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything works perfect, and it is a great item, for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: solid Microphone with the feel of quality like I remember they were in the 70"s
customer_reviews.text: Just the ticket, one solid unit , Metal not plastic, solid Microphone with the feel of quality like I remember they were in the 70"s . Dials are smooth and have a quality feel when you rotate them, channel selector has a nice crisp feel when changing channels. a good sounding radio. Make sure you have an SWR meter to adjust your antenna, I purchased the Astatic PDC1 100 watt SWR Meter after looking over quite a few, this unit works very well and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: nice C.B. works well. clear sound, alot of range.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with set. I drive truck for a living,and I use it all the time.It is very professional set. I would recommend it for any driver.
customer_reviews.author: William G. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mic does not have the audio I thought it would
customer_reviews.author: Carl in GA.

customer_reviews.title: swr wont even out
customer_reviews.text: no matter what i do the swr wont even out i even to it to the cb shop and after $150 it evened out with all new drives and finals
customer_reviews.author: Carla Webb

customer_reviews.title: So far the radio is great, unfortunately the mic is crap only lasted a ...
customer_reviews.text: So far the radio is great , unfortunately the mic is crap only lasted a month, good thing I bought an Astatic mic with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: It said used but......
customer_reviews.text: This this is scratched up and looks like crap, the mic wire was knotted up and it didn't come with mounting hardware or even the screws to attach a mount! Also didn't come with a fuse break! Luckily I have some fabrication knowledge and was able to make a mount or I would have sent it back
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money. i use it almost everyday and the sound is clear, and the mic works as it should :)
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great little CB
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little CB to have. Fits in small places and has all the basic functions.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Sr.

customer_reviews.title: as a gift
customer_reviews.text: this cb radio was bought for my son for Christmas iwas told by him that it is a great radio and it really does a great job. I am a retired tr uck driver and knew the midland is one of the best radios out there. I also got fast service and it arrived before Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nemeth R. Nemeth

customer_reviews.title: IMPRESSIVE!
customer_reviews.text: GAVE THIS AS A GIFT AND HE IS STILL PROUD AND EXCITED ABOUT IT. HE SAYS IT HAS IMPRESSIVE RECEPTION AND IS OBVIOUSLY BUILT TO LAST.
customer_reviews.author: paisley

customer_reviews.title: problems from the start. would not recieve a signal ...
customer_reviews.text: problems from the start. would not recieve a signal. hooked it up to about 15 different set ups. took it to a shop to look at it. he toild me the there was a ground in the recieve path inside the radio.
customer_reviews.author: LED PRO

customer_reviews.title: Midland 5001Z Review
customer_reviews.text: Provides good clear sound provided that it is tuned to your antenna. Very satisfied with product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs O

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: GETS OUT GOOD AND DOES NOT MAKE A BUNCH OF NOISE EASY TO HOOK UP HAD SAME KIND OF PLUG IN THAT MOST OF THEM HAVE
customer_reviews.author: DEBNSTAN

customer_reviews.title: It worked good on day one.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new CB to replace my Radio Shack which died, I use it on road trips with friends who also own RV's, it's the best way to stay in contact with the group. I owned Midlands in the past (70's and 80's) so I went back to them. It worked good new but now after less than a year it quit transmitting, seems to be a mic switch problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I use to own a similar midland in the 70's and the product is still "Rocking". I recieve great reception when driving from ATL to AL. I use a Cobra HG A1500 Antenna and everything works great!. Traveling at above 75 MPH I get great reception.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Jaggears

product_meta.title: Midland 5001Z 40-Channel Mobile CB with Switchable Noise Filter
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingMobile CB Radio, 4-Pin Connector Type, Number of Channels 40, Power Output 4 Watts, Cord Length 9 ft. , Features Instant Access to Channel 9, RF Gain Control, Dimmer Switch, External Speaker Jacks, PA Function, Includes Mounting Bracket And Hardware, Fused DC Power Cord, Owners Manual
feature_bullets: PA function, Dimmer Switch, Analog Power Meter, and Automatic Noise Limiter.
Full Size Microphone with locking connector

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars182 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
